import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material"; import "./post.css"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData.js"; export default function Post({ post }) { return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePic} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people liked
{post.comment} commnets
); }
